exercise-tasks.description: Create an index on the Name column in the Countries table
exercise-tasks.chatgpt-prompt:
Explain why this CREATE INDEX statement is valid. What table and column does it reference, and how would this index help queries that search for countries by name?

Correct query:
CREATE INDEX idx_countries_name ON Countries (Name)

exercise-tasks.description: Create an index on the Region column in the Countries table
exercise-tasks.chatgpt-prompt:
Explain what this index does and why indexing the Region column could improve performance for queries that filter by region, such as finding all countries in Oceania.

Correct query:
CREATE INDEX idx_countries_region ON Countries (Region)

exercise-tasks.description: Create an index on the Population column in the Countries table
exercise-tasks.chatgpt-prompt:
Explain why creating an index on a numeric column like Population can be useful. What types of queries would benefit from this index, and are there cases where it might not be necessary?

Correct query:
CREATE INDEX idx_countries_population ON Countries (Population)
